actions.title: [Site Watcher #178] Wire x402 payment into headless-markets — 137h build stall, CRITICAL
actions.reason: Build stall reached 137 hours (5.7 days) since last commit. AgentScan launched on Base with ERC-8004 standard — 17,887 agent registrations, machine-to-machine economy actively forming. x402 HTTP payment standard gaining ecosystem traction. headless-markets architecture supports x402 natively but integration not wired — 13+ consecutive cycles without action. nullpath.com already using x402. Every cycle without wiring x402 = compounding competitive risk. This is the core revenue mechanism for agent-to-agent payments on Base.

market_signals.topic: AI agent token ecosystem on Base
market_signals.key_finding: AgentScan launched on Base as ERC-8004 AI agent discovery layer. Base dominates with 17,887 agent registrations vs Ethereum's 1,967. Strong network effects emerging. x402 HTTP payment standard gaining institutional tracking. Base ecosystem shows 1.23M addresses, 85% new user conversion, $100M+ ETH transaction value. Market pricing in AI agent narrative with Base as leading indicator. Top agents building specialized pay-per-use services. Machine-to-machine economy forming with 12,530 feedback events on Base (6x Ethereum mainnet).
